title: Beautiful apartments in Barton Creek
posting_body: Text 2875B to my cell for more info!
Welcome to The  brand new luxury apartments in Austin, TX.
Here you can enjoy living minutes away from downtown Austin, yet being tucked away amidst a tranquil Hill Country setting.
The Santal apartments are located within Barton Creek and offers both Hill Country and downtown Austin views.
While staying in one of our luxury apartments you can picture yourself on your patio or balcony, looking out over the scenic Hill Country with the back drop of the Austin skyline in the distance.
At our brand new Austin apartments you can enjoy the fresh air on your morning walk through the Barton Creek Habitat Preserve, or take in the surrounding peacefulness after a hard day's work.
The Santal, a LEED community, features amenities and luxuries both inside and outside to enhance your experience while relaxing your senses.
Our apartments in Barton Creek offer the best of both worlds with easy access to downtown entertainment and abundant outdoor activities in the Texas Hill Country.
The Santal is located near local technology companies such as, Advanced Micro Devices, SolarWinds, NXP Freescale, and Silicon Labs.
Schedule your tour today and discover your new home at The Santal luxury apartments in Austin, TX
